p: Microorganisms used in the experiment were standard reference strains sourced from the Microbiology laboratory, Kenyatta University, namely, Salmonella typhi (ATCC 19430), Escherichia coli (ATCC 25922), Shigella sonnei (ATCC 25931), Bacillus subtilis (ATCC 21332), and Staphylococcus aureus (ATCC 25923).
